body: Hi Youngjae, Good to know that you are making good progress. The result difference is because in the case on the right normal directions are wrong. You need to flip the surfaces and then the results will be the same. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/jNrZ7iSqItZxZeB-7SVMfJFdiSxf53tVEC9ivOXQ2V-zBD-kIYygLBe6PeZihuzOunkF*P6GezGY0TmehR4GmRYkNOLF3u1E/NormalDirection.png)
